reviewText: a great comedy team that is not well known in the states but should be. this dvd is a lot of fun

Australian filmmaker Ralph Smart is a scenarist on this wonderful comedy gem from Gainsborough Studios. The Crazy Gang, 1930s precursors to the Goons and Monty Python, unleash a genie (Alistair Sim) from a button made from metal off Aladdin's original lamp and the fun and games begin.  Sim and the Gang are hilarious. An absolute hoot. Smart's co-writers Marriott Edgar and Val Guest often worked together on Gainsborough comedies with the Crazy Gang, Arthur Askey and Will Hay.
